text: Roger Thomas Forster (1 March 1933 – 17 January 2024) was an English theologian. He was the leader of Ichthus Christian Fellowship, a neocharismatic Evangelical Christian Church that forms part of the British New Church Movement.P D Hocken in Stanley M Burgess, Eduard M van der Maas New International Dictionary of Pentecostal and Charismatic Movements s.v. “Roger T Forster” He was thought to be "one of the finest minds in the Evangelical constituency."Andrew Walker Restoring the Kingdom: the Radical Christianity of the House Church Movement 3rd Ed (Guildford: Eagle, 1998) 37 He died at his home in Forest Hill, London on the 17 January 2024, at the age of 90. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Alumni of the University of Cambridge Category:English Protestants Category:English theologians Category:Evangelicals Category:Writers from London
